claim: Astronauts experience zero gravity because there is no gravity in space

supporting.text: Gravity exists everywhere in space, including in orbit around Earth, as it is a fundamental force exerted by all masses.

attacks.text: Gravity exists everywhere in space, including in orbit around Earth, as it is a fundamental force exerted by all masses.
